name: File Stream Bot
description: A Pyrogram Telegram bot to access Telegram Files via the web.

ENV.description: Set this to True if you don't want to crash the bot

BIN_CHANNEL.description: The BIN Channel ID. Read the readme for more info about this var

SLEEP_THRESHOLD.description: Floodwait Sleep timer. Read the readme for more info about this var

WORKERS.description: Number of workers that is to be assigned. Read the readme for more info about this var

NO_PORT.description: If you don't want your port to be displayed. Read the readme for more info about this var

BIND_ADDRESS.description: Read the readme for more info about this var

PING_INTERVAL.description: The time in s you want the servers to be pinged each time to avoid sleeping.

FQDN.description: A Fully Qualified Domain Name or Heroku App URL. (eg. https://example.herokuapp.com). Update it After Deploying the Bot

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram User ID(Note: Not Username)

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Update Channel Username without @ eg: AWeirdText

FORCE_UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Set to True, if you want every user Join update channel to use the bot

SESSION_NAME.description: Mongodb Database Name Default to F2LxBot

KEEP_ALIVE.description: If you want to make the server ping itself every `PING_INTERVAL` seconds to avoid sleeping. Helpful in PaaS Free tiers. Defaults to `False`

TOS.description: URL to your Terms of Service Text

LINK_LIMIT.description: Limit Number of Links a User Can Generate. Value should be a Number
